code.label: Coupon code
code.helper_text_new: To find the right code, go to the Coupons page, select a coupon and scroll down to the Codes section.
code.helper_text_existing: Applied codes can't be modified. To replace this code, remove it using the button below and then add a new one.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this coupon code? This might affect the cart total.
